ARABIC: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ وَٱصْطَبِرْ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We will send the she-camel as a trial for them. Just keep a watchful eye on them and be steadfast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We shall send the she-camel to try them. So watch them, and be constant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We shall send the she-camel as a trial for them; so watch their end with patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We are sending the she-camel to them to test them. So watch them and be patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “We shall send a she-camel to test them, therefore O Saleh, wait and have patience.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We are sending the she-camel as a test for them. So watch them, and be patient!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We are going to send the she-camel as a trial for them; therefore watch them and have patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They shall send the She-camel as a trial for them; so watch thou them and keep patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We are sending the she-camel as a test for them; so watch them and have patience;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: for We are [going to] send the she-camel as a trial for them, so watch them and be patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verify We are sending the she-camel as a test for them, so watch them thou and have patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We are sending the She-camel as a trial for them; so watch them and be steadfast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For We will send the she-camel by way of trial for them. So watch them, (O Salih), and possess thyself in patience!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, We are sending the she-camel as a test for them. So watch them [O Salih (Saleh)], and be patient!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We are sending to them as a trial, a shecamel, so watch them and have patience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We are sending the she-camel as a test for them; so watch them and be patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:27] Lo! We are sending the She-camel, We will bring it forth out of the mountain, the rock, as they demanded, as a trial, a test, for them, that We may try them. So watch them, O Sālih, await [to see] what they will do and what will be done with them, and remain patient (istabir: the tā’ here has replaced the tā’ of [the 8th form] ifta‘ala), in other words, endure their harm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then Allah said to Salih: (Lo! We are sending the she-camel) We shall bring forth the she-camel from the rock (as a test for them) as a trial for your folk; (so watch them) wait until the she-camel is brought forth (and have patience) for the harm coming to you and for the killing of the she-camel;
